overview: A 13 year veteran of the video games industry, Jason Willig is the Chief Executive Officer of Booyah, Inc., the leading publisher of location-based & real-world mobile games. Prior to joining Booyah in 2011, Willig spent four years at Electronic Arts as the COO of the Hasbro unit where he oversaw operating activities & led strategic initiatives across retail packaged goods, connected console, virtual world, social & mobile gaming categories. Jason has held executive & leadership positions at top game companies including LucasArts, Gas Powered Games and Vivendi Games. His diverse experience encompasses product development, retail and digital publishing, product management & analytics, business development & operations. Jason is a member of the International Game Developers Association & the Academy of Interactive Arts & Sciences. He holds a bachelorâ€™s degree in Chinese from the University of Massachusetts.
